item.title: Problem with the quest log!
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:6, topic:445328”][quote author=Level 120 Dungeoneering link=topic=548027.msg4018503#msg4018503 date=1339824361]

         case 0:
            c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("Away at Sea",8144);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("I can start this quest by talking to Davy Jones.",8146);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("He is located in Port Welnar.",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8148);
            break;
            
         case 1:
            c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("Away at Sea",8144);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to Davy Jones.", 8146);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Walnar.",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("He has asked you to get the following items:",8148);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 rope",8149);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 vail of sea water",8150);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 piece of corral",8151);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8152);
            break;
            
         case 2:
            c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("Away at Sea",8144);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to the Davy Jones.", 8146);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Welnar.",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He has asked you to get the following items:",8148);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 rope",8149);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 vail of sea water",8150);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 piece of corral",8151);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@QUEST COMPLETED",8152);
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            break;
         }
      }
   }

Would this work?
[/quote]

Why don’t you try it and find out for yourself[/quote]

I am not near a computer right now. I’m on my iPad.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with the quest log!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Level 120 Dungeoneering, post:5, topic:445328”][code=java]
case 0:
c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Away at Sea”,8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“I can start this quest by talking to Davy Jones.”,8146);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“He is located in Port Welnar.”,8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8148);
break;

     case 1:
        c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
        c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("Away at Sea",8144);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to Davy Jones.", 8146);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Walnar.",8147);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("He has asked you to get the following items:",8148);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 rope",8149);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 vail of sea water",8150);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 piece of corral",8151);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8152);
        break;
        
     case 2:
        c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
        c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("Away at Sea",8144);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to the Davy Jones.", 8146);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Welnar.",8147);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He has asked you to get the following items:",8148);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 rope",8149);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 vail of sea water",8150);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 piece of corral",8151);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@QUEST COMPLETED",8152);
        c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
        break;
     }
  }

}
[/code]

Would this work?[/quote]

Why don’t you try it and find out for yourself

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with the quest log!
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The numbers relate to the interface ID, and frame 126 changes the text on that ID, so in this case the numbers relate to each line on the quest log

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with the quest log!
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:445328”] c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to the Davy Jones.", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Welnar.",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("He has asked you to get the following items:",8147);

You’re overwriting the same ID multiple times[/quote]

So, would it work if I did this?

c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to the Davy Jones.", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Welnar.",8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("He has asked you to get the following items:",8150);

Do the numbers symbolize something? Or are they just random?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with the quest log!
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin

You’re overwriting the same ID multiple times

item.title: Problem with the quest log!
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

Well, here’s my code:

         case 0:
            c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("Away at Sea",8144);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("I can start this quest by talking to Davy Jones.",8145);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("He is located in Port Welnar.",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8154);
            break;
            
         case 1:
            c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cook's Assisstant Quest",8144);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to Davy Jones.", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Walnar.",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("He has asked you to get the following items:",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 rope",8148);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 vail of sea water",8149);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("1 piece of corral",8150);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8154);
            break;
            
         case 2:
            c.getPA().clearQuestInterface();
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cook's Assisstant Quest",8144);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I can start this quest by talking to the Davy Jones.", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He is located in Port Welnar.",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He has asked you to get the following items:",8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 rope",8148);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 vail of sea water",8149);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 piece of corral",8150);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@QUEST COMPLETED",8151);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("",8154);
            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            break;
         }
      }
   }

So, it worked, I compiled it in Eclipse, and it doesn’t display all of it, it doesn’t display the @str@ text at all, it just displays the things that are not strokethrough. Any ideas?

Read full topic
